plot: Short documentary about the Spanish cities of Segovia and Ávila. Featuring the palace of La Granja de San Idelfonso, the El Escorial monastery and paintings of El Greco.
title: Dos ciudades históricas y dos sitios reales
plot_es: Short documentary about the Spanish cities of Segovia and Ávila. Featuring the palace of La Granja de San Idelfonso, the El Escorial monastery and paintings of El Greco.
